alert.note: Alert for Kimble (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 1:47AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kimble County through 245 AM CDT... At 147 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Segovia, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Segovia, Us-83 Near The Kerr- Kimble County Line, The Intersection Of I-10 And Us 290 and I- 10 Near The Kimble-Kerr County Line. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 459 and 477. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for west central Texas.
